00054 LoadDataSource::LoadDataSource(String fname, String header_fname, std::vector<String> &key_columns, String timestamp_column) : m_go_mask(0), m_source(fname), m_cur_line(0), m_line_buffer(0), m_row_key_buffer(0), m_hyperformat(false), m_leading_timestamps(false), m_timestamp_index(-1), m_timestamp(0), m_offset(0), m_zipped(false) {
00055   string line, column_name;
00056   char *base, *ptr;
00057   int index = 0;
00058   KeyComponentInfo key_comps;
00059 
00060   if (boost::algorithm::ends_with(fname, ".gz")) {
00061     m_fin.push(gzip_decompressor());
00062     m_zipped = true;
00063   }
00064   m_fin.push(m_source);
00065 
00066   if (header_fname != "") {
00067     std::ifstream in(header_fname.c_str());
00068     if (!getline(in, line))
00069       return;
00070   }
00071   else {
00072     if (!getline(m_fin, line))
00073       return;
00074   }
00075 
00076   m_go_mask = new bool [ 257 ];
00077   memset(m_go_mask, true, 257*sizeof(bool));
00078 
00079   base = (char *)line.c_str();
00080   if (*base == '#') {
00081     base++;
00082     while (isspace(*base))
00083       base++;
00084   }
00085   while ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) != 0) {
00086     *ptr++ = 0;
00087     m_column_names.push_back(base);
00088     column_name = String(base);
00089     if (timestamp_column != "" && timestamp_column == column_name) {
00090       m_timestamp_index = index;
00091       m_go_mask[index] = false;
00092     }
00093     base = ptr;
00094     index++;
00095     HT_EXPECT(index < 256, Error::ASSERTION_FAILURE);
00096   }
00097   m_column_names.push_back(base);
00098 
00102   for (size_t i=0; i<key_columns.size(); i++) {
00103     size_t j;
00104     const char *ptr;
00105 
00106     key_comps.clear();
00107 
00108     if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "\\%"))
00109       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(1);
00110     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%0")) {
00111       key_comps.pad_character = '0';
00112       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(2);
00113       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00114       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00115       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00116         ptr++;
00117       column_name = String(ptr);
00118     }
00119     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%-")) {
00120       key_comps.left_justify = true;
00121       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(2);
00122       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00123       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00124       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00125         ptr++;
00126       column_name = String(ptr);
00127     }
00128     else if (boost::algorithm::starts_with(key_columns[i], "%")) {
00129       column_name = key_columns[i].substr(1);
00130       ptr = column_name.c_str();
00131       key_comps.width = atoi(ptr);
00132       while (isdigit(*ptr))
00133         ptr++;
00134       column_name = String(ptr);
00135     }
00136     else
00137       column_name = key_columns[i];
00138 
00139     for (j=0; j<m_column_names.size(); j++) {
00140       if (m_column_names[j] == column_name) {
00141         key_comps.index = j;
00142         m_key_comps.push_back(key_comps);
00143         m_go_mask[j] = false;
00144         break;
00145       }
00146     }
00147     if (j == m_column_names.size()) {
00148       cout << "ERROR: key column '" << column_name << "' not found in input file" << endl;
00149       exit(1);
00150     }
00151   }
00152 
00153   if (m_key_comps.empty()) {
00154     key_comps.clear();
00155     m_key_comps.push_back(key_comps);
00156     m_go_mask[0] = false;
00157   }
00158 
00159   if (m_column_names.size() == 3 || m_column_names.size() == 4) {
00160     size_t i=m_column_names.size()-3;
00161     if (m_column_names[i] == "rowkey" &&
00162         m_column_names[i+1] == "columnkey" &&
00163         m_column_names[i+2] == "value") {
00164       if (i == 0 || m_column_names[0] == "timestamp") {
00165         m_hyperformat = true;
00166         m_leading_timestamps = (i==1);
00167       }
00168     }
00169   }
00170 
00171   m_next_value = m_column_names.size();
00172   m_limit = 0;
00173 
00174   if (!m_hyperformat && m_column_names.size() < 2)
00175     throw Exception(Error::HQL_BAD_LOAD_FILE_FORMAT, "No columns specified in load file");
00176 
00177   m_cur_line = 1;
00178 
00179   return;
00180 }

00186 bool LoadDataSource::next(uint32_t *type_flagp, uint64_t *timestampp, KeySpec *keyp, uint8_t **valuep, uint32_t *value_lenp, uint32_t *consumedp) {
00187   string line;
00188   int index;
00189   char *base, *ptr, *colon, *endptr;
00190 
00191   if (type_flagp)
00192     *type_flagp = FLAG_INSERT;
00193   
00194   if (consumedp)
00195     *consumedp = 0;
00196 
00197   if (m_hyperformat) {
00198 
00199     while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00200       m_cur_line++;
00201 
00202       if (consumedp && !m_zipped)
00203         *consumedp += line.length() + 1;
00204 
00205       m_line_buffer.clear();
00206 
00207       m_line_buffer.add(line.c_str(), strlen(line.c_str())+1);
00208 
00209       base = (char *)m_line_buffer.base;
00210 
00214       if (m_leading_timestamps) {
00215         if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00216           cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00217           continue;
00218         }
00219         *ptr++ = 0;
00220         *timestampp = strtoll(base, &endptr, 10);
00221         if (*endptr != 0) {
00222           cerr << "error: invalid timestamp (" << base << ") on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00223           continue;
00224         }
00225         base = ptr;
00226       }
00227       else
00228         *timestampp = 0;
00229 
00233       if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00234         cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00235         continue;
00236       }
00237       keyp->row = base;
00238       keyp->row_len = ptr - base;
00239       *ptr++ = 0;
00240       base = ptr;
00241 
00245       if ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) == 0) {
00246         cerr << "error: too few fields on line " << m_cur_line << endl;
00247         continue;
00248       }
00249       *ptr = 0;
00250 
00251       if ((colon = strchr(base, ':')) != 0) {
00252         *colon++ = 0;
00253         keyp->column_family = base;
00254         if (colon < ptr) {
00255           keyp->column_qualifier = colon;
00256           keyp->column_qualifier_len = ptr - colon;
00257         }
00258         else {
00259           keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00260           keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00261         }
00262       }
00263       else {
00264         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00265         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00266       }
00267       keyp->column_family = base;
00268       ptr++;
00269 
00273       *valuep = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00274       *value_lenp = strlen(ptr);
00275 
00276       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00277         uint64_t new_offset = m_source.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::cur);
00278         *consumedp = new_offset - m_offset;
00279         m_offset = new_offset;
00280       }
00281 
00282       return true;
00283     }
00284   }
00285   else {
00286 
00287     while (!m_go_mask[m_next_value])
00288       m_next_value++;
00289 
00290     if (m_next_value > 0 && m_next_value < (size_t)m_limit) {
00291       keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00292       keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill();
00293       keyp->column_family = m_column_names[m_next_value].c_str();
00294       *timestampp = m_timestamp;
00295       // clear these, just in case they were set by the client
00296       if (keyp->column_qualifier || keyp->column_qualifier_len) {
00297         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00298         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00299       }
00300       if (m_values[m_next_value] == 0) {
00301         *valuep = 0;
00302         *value_lenp = 0;
00303       }
00304       else {
00305         *valuep = (uint8_t *)m_values[m_next_value];
00306         *value_lenp = strlen(m_values[m_next_value]);
00307       }
00308       m_next_value++;
00309 
00310       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00311         uint64_t new_offset = m_source.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::cur);
00312         *consumedp = new_offset - m_offset;
00313         m_offset = new_offset;
00314       }
00315 
00316       return true;
00317     }
00318 
00319     while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00320       m_cur_line++;
00321       index = 0;
00322 
00323       if (consumedp && !m_zipped)
00324         *consumedp += line.length() + 1;
00325 
00326       m_line_buffer.clear();
00327       m_line_buffer.add(line.c_str(), strlen(line.c_str())+1);
00328       m_values.clear();
00329 
00330       base = (char *)m_line_buffer.base;
00331 
00332       while ((ptr = strchr(base, '\t')) != 0) {
00333         *ptr++ = 0;
00334         if (strlen(base) == 0 || !strcmp(base, "NULL") || !strcmp(base, "\\N")) {
00335           if (!m_go_mask[index]) {
00336             cout << "WARNING: Required key or timestamp field not found on line " << m_cur_line << ", skipping ..." << endl << flush;
00337             continue;
00338           }
00339           m_values.push_back(0);
00340         }
00341         else
00342           m_values.push_back(base);
00343         base = ptr;
00344         index++;
00345       }
00346       if (strlen(base) == 0 || !strcmp(base, "NULL") || !strcmp(base, "\\N"))
00347         m_values.push_back(0);
00348       else
00349         m_values.push_back(base);
00350       m_limit = std::min(m_values.size(), m_column_names.size());
00351 
00355       m_row_key_buffer.clear();
00356       if (!add_row_component(0))
00357         continue;
00358       size_t i;
00359       for (i=1; i<m_key_comps.size(); i++) {
00360         m_row_key_buffer.add( " ", 1 );
00361         if (!add_row_component(i))
00362           break;
00363       }
00364       if (i<m_key_comps.size())
00365         continue;
00366       m_row_key_buffer.ensure(1);
00367       *m_row_key_buffer.ptr = 0;
00368 
00369       if (m_timestamp_index >= 0) {
00370         struct tm tm;
00371         time_t t;
00372 
00373         if (m_values.size() <= (size_t)m_timestamp_index) {
00374           cerr << "warn: timestamp field not found on line " << m_cur_line << ", skipping..." << endl;
00375           continue;
00376         }       
00377 
00378         if (!parse_date_format(m_values[m_timestamp_index], &tm)) {
00379           cerr << "warn: invalid timestamp format on line " << m_cur_line << ", skipping..." << endl;
00380           continue;
00381         }
00382 
00383         if ((t = timegm(&tm)) == (time_t)-1) {
00384           cerr << "warn: invalid timestamp format on line " << m_cur_line << ", skipping..." << endl;
00385           continue;
00386         }
00387 
00388         m_timestamp = (uint64_t)t * 1000000000LL;
00389       }
00390 
00391       m_next_value = 0;
00392       while (!m_go_mask[m_next_value])
00393         m_next_value++;
00394 
00395       keyp->row = m_row_key_buffer.base;
00396       keyp->row_len = m_row_key_buffer.fill();
00397       keyp->column_family = m_column_names[m_next_value].c_str();
00398       *timestampp = m_timestamp;
00399       if (keyp->column_qualifier || keyp->column_qualifier_len) {
00400         keyp->column_qualifier = 0;
00401         keyp->column_qualifier_len = 0;
00402       }
00403       if (m_values[m_next_value] == 0) {
00404         *valuep = 0;
00405         *value_lenp = 0;
00406       }
00407       else {
00408         *valuep = (uint8_t *)m_values[m_next_value];
00409         *value_lenp = strlen(m_values[m_next_value]);
00410       }
00411       m_next_value++;
00412 
00413       if (m_zipped && consumedp) {
00414         uint64_t new_offset = m_source.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::cur);
00415         *consumedp = new_offset - m_offset;
00416         m_offset = new_offset;
00417       }
00418 
00419       return true;
00420     }
00421 
00422   }
00423 
00424   return false;
00425 }

00429 bool LoadDataSource::add_row_component(int index) {
00430   const char *value = m_values[m_key_comps[index].index];
00431   size_t value_len = strlen(value);
00432 
00433   if ((size_t)m_key_comps[index].index >= m_values.size() || value == 0) {
00434     cout << "WARNING: Required key field not found on line " << m_cur_line << ", skipping ..." << endl << flush;
00435     return false;
00436   }
00437 
00438   if ((size_t)m_key_comps[index].width > value_len) {
00439     size_t padding = m_key_comps[index].width - value_len;
00440     m_row_key_buffer.ensure( m_key_comps[index].width );
00441     if (m_key_comps[index].left_justify) {
00442       m_row_key_buffer.add( value, value_len );
00443       memset(m_row_key_buffer.ptr, m_key_comps[index].pad_character, padding);
00444       m_row_key_buffer.ptr += padding;
00445     }
00446     else {
00447       memset(m_row_key_buffer.ptr, m_key_comps[index].pad_character, padding);
00448       m_row_key_buffer.ptr += padding;
00449       m_row_key_buffer.add( value, value_len );
00450     }
00451   }
00452   else
00453     m_row_key_buffer.add( value, value_len );
00454 
00455   return true;
00456   
00457 }

00461 bool LoadDataSource::parse_date_format(const char *str, struct tm *tm) {
00462   int ival;
00463   const char *ptr = str;
00464   char *end_ptr;
00465 
00469   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 4 || *end_ptr != '-')
00470     return false;
00471   tm->tm_year = ival - 1900;
00472 
00473   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00474 
00478   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != '-')
00479     return false;
00480   tm->tm_mon = ival - 1;
00481 
00482   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00483   
00487   if ((ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10)) == 0 || (end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != ' ')
00488     return false;
00489   tm->tm_mday = ival;
00490 
00491   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00492 
00496   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00497   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != ':')
00498     return false;
00499   tm->tm_hour = ival;
00500 
00501   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00502 
00506   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00507   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2 || *end_ptr != ':')
00508     return false;
00509   tm->tm_min = ival;
00510 
00511   ptr = end_ptr + 1;
00512 
00516   ival = strtol(ptr, &end_ptr, 10);
00517   if ((end_ptr - ptr) != 2)
00518     return false;
00519   tm->tm_sec = ival;
00520 
00521   tm->tm_gmtoff = 0;
00522   tm->tm_zone = "GMT";
00523 
00524   return true;
00525 }
